summary.Title: Cook wanted for Brewery & Restaurant
summary.Presentation:
We are busy at the Inner Copenhagen Brewery, which is why we are looking for a committed and energetic cook who can be part of BrewPub's team of dedicated colleagues in our kitchen.
BrewPub

WorkPlace.Name: BrewPub København - ALE INVEST A/S
WorkPlace.Description:
Ale Invest ejer "BrewPub København", som er Københavns innovative Bryghus, Restaurant og Pub. Endvidere råder vi over en af byens mest charmerende gårdhaver. Vi er beliggende 2 minutter fra Rådhuspladsen i det centale København.
På BrewPub København brygger vi vores eget spændende og unikke øl, som sælges i bar såvel som restauranten til mad under overskriften "Det Nye Danske Ølkøkken". Det betyder, at vi tilbereder måltider der passer til øl, og laver retter hvor øl indgår.

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
We are busy at the Inner Copenhagen Brewery, which is why we are looking for a committed and energetic cook who can be part of BrewPub's team of dedicated colleagues in our kitchen.

BrewPub is the only brewery within Copenhagen's old ramparts - and our passion for craft  beer & a good meal permeates everything we do.

We have a strong focus on meeting our guests with an informal - but professional - attitude, and want to give our guests unique experiences during their visit every single day.

As a workplace, we place great emphasis on having good form and a nice working environment - even when we are busy ... !!!

About your professional qualifications.
BrewPub Copenhagen has a distinctly flat organization, and we have a firm belief that all our colleagues are loyal, competent, can make decisions and still want to get better at their jobs.

In addition, we have the following expectations for your profile:

  • You are a colleague who places high professional demands on your work as a chef
  • You do have experience - but it can also be your first job as a trained chef
  • You are committed and ready to invest some of yourself in your work

But above all ... you are endowed with a professional pride, and naturally want to give your guests a fabulously good dining experience!

We offer:

  • A position in a young environment where there is plenty of opportunity to influence the daily walk
  • A close relationship between management and staff as well as a flat hierarchy
  • An working life with variety, high tempo and good colleagues
  • A workplace with lots of job satisfaction, high spirits and a strong unity

If you can see yourself as our future colleague, then send us a motivated application and CV to Chef Jack Forsmann via email.

Note: We are often very busy, which is why we do not want telephone inquiries.
